description: Convert amounts between currencies with up-to-date rates. Get accurate conversions for budgeting, pricing, and travel planning. Automate multi-currency workflows and reduce manual calculations.

capabilities.name: currency_exchange
capabilities.description:
Convert currency from one type to another.
    
    Args:
        from_currency: Source currency code (e.g., 'USD')
        to_currency: Target currency code (e.g., 'EUR')
        amount: Amount to convert
        api_key: Your API key for the exchange rate service (optional, will use EXCHANGE_RATE_API_KEY from .env if not provided)
        
    Returns:
        Dictionary with conversion details
